downloadTitle: Technical Documentation Download for System Center 2012 – Virtual Machine Manager
downloadDescription: This page lists the technical documentation downloads that are available for the Virtual Machine Manager component of System Center 2012.
detailsSection:
The downloadable files listed on this page contain the product documentation for the Virtual Machine Manager component of System Center 2012 R2. The available downloads include:

  • System Center 2012 R2 – Virtual Machine Manager Technical Documentation, last updated March 10, 2014 (pdf & docx)
  • White Paper - Managing Fibre Channel in System Center 2012 R2 Virtual Machine Manager, last updated April 22, 2014 (pdf & docx)
systemRequirementsSection:
• Word Viewer
  • Microsoft Word 2013
  • Microsoft Word 2010
  • Microsoft Word 2007
  • Microsoft Word 2003
  • Microsoft Word 2002
  • Microsoft Word 2000
installInstructionSection:
1. Click the Download button to start the download.
  2. Do one of the following:
    • To start the installation immediately, click Open.
    • To copy the download to your computer for installation at a later time, click Save.
    • To cancel the installation, click Cancel.

relatedResourcesSection.title: technical Documentation for Virtual Machine Manager in the TechNet Library
